TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SsaSpikeDetector extends Microsoft.ML.Transforms.TimeSeries.SsaAnomalyDetectionBaseWrapper implements class Microsoft.ML.ICanSaveModel, class Microsoft.ML.ITransformer
Public NotInheritable Class SsaSpikeDetector Inherits SsaAnomalyDetectionBaseWrapper Implements ITransformer
type SsaSpikeDetector = class inherit SsaAnomalyDetectionBaseWrapper interface ITransformer interface ICanSaveModel

Docs.summary: This class implements the spike detector transform based on Singular Spectrum modeling of the time-series. For the details of the Singular Spectrum Analysis (SSA), refer to http://arxiv.org/pdf/1206.6910.pdf.
